body:
Hi,

ok, the overlapping... I think I understood the problem ;-) And yes, it
is not really a typical application for radiance. I had been hoping
that this would be an easy modification because of the instance
primitive, but obviously I was wrong.

CU Lars.
--
Lars O. Grobe, grobe@gmx.net, ++90-212-2458330

Galatasaray - Beyoglu, 34433 Istanbul
